name: A
description: Offers a wide range of products named 'A', highly durable and designed for specific applications.

name: Zero Air Generator
description: Offers a wide range of Zero Air Generators for various industrial applications with affordable pricing.

name: Vaccum Oven
description: Designed for drying and heating under controlled conditions from atmospheric pressure to vacuum up to 30” Hg.
features: Vacuum gauge, electronic controller, and heat selector on the top-mounted control panel
Vacuum levels controlled between 2” and 30” Hg
Radiant warm wall heat ensures even heat distribution

name: Spot Extrusion System
description: Exhausts fumes from work surfaces with 360-degree rotation and adjustable angles. Made from aluminum with PP/FRP exhaust blower.
features: Aluminum body with PP/FRP exhaust blower

name: Muffle Furnace
description: Heavy-duty furnace with ceramic insulation and precise temperature control.
features: Heavy-duty exterior with epoxy blue powder coating
Energy regulator, solid-state digital controller, or microprocessor controller
High temp. up to 1400°C with PID-based controller

name: Laboratory Furniture
description: Provides durable, chemical-resistant steel furniture with options for wooden doors and drawer fronts for better aesthetics.
features: Drawer and shutter configurations to meet specific needs
Wooden door and drawer fronts for aesthetics

name: Instruments And Accessories
description: Offers a variety of sinks and accessories, including drop-in sinks made of ceramic, stainless, and polypropylene.
features: Drop-in sinks in ceramic, stainless, and polypropylene
Highly resistant to acids, solvents, and salts

name: High Pressure Manifolds System
description: Manufactures high-pressure manifolds systems for turbines, rotary systems, air-water showers, and continuous cylinder consumption.
features: Used for turbines, rotary systems, air-water showers

name: High Pressure Gas Lining
description: Commissioning high-pressure gas lining from ¼ inches to 2.0 inches using welding or detachable fitting processes.

name: Heating Mantle
description: Non-rusting aluminum housing with epoxy powder coating and high-quality insulation for temperature control.
features: Booster heaters in bigger sizes, usable with round flask

name: Glove Box
description: Available in Acrylic, Stainless Steel, and MS material. Includes Programmable Logic Control Manual control and positive pressure method.
features: Control: Programmable Logic Control Manual Control
Method: Positive Pressure, Hydrogen, and Catalyst

name: Gas Purification Panel
description: Purifies gas for GC detectors and ICP, ICP MS, AAS. Removes moisture up to 99.999% ppm.
features: Panel for gas lines: H2, N2, Air, He, Hr, CH4, Butane, Ammonia, and Oxygen
Micro particle filters 5 µ to 20 µ
Gas Control Box for each gas

name: Fume Hood
description: Manufacturer of MS, Powder Coated, Stainless Steel 302, 316, and 316L. Specializes in designing high-densile polypropylene materials.
features: Accommodates large and complex apparatus setups
Base cabinet and level adjustment legs
